defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: William B. Alexander. Records, 1842-1921. Accession 29658, Business records Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Waynesboro Public Library, per Dorothy Anne Reinhold, 10 October 1977.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: William B. Alexander was a cabinetmaker and waggoner in Augusta County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Includes a memorandum book, covering the years 1842 and 1846-1871, which lists 803 coffins, including names, death dates, and causes of death (Accession 29658a), as well as a ledger (Accession 29658b) which covers the years 1850-1888 and 1921.
